1558540428_1HvtaEP4h88QTu4Pv1a7SDuq1H6v7.body: @filedropper: Thanks for the feedback. Feel free to post any feature requests or bug reports you may have here!

Oh, it's definitely "the real thing". The strategy is to provide an enhanced user experience and better network performance. Embrace, extend and enhance! And with that in mind, 0.9.40-7+ is now available, featuring an overhauled tunnel manager: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:d99f189d997f6b7a7ad4fae075554949531ce3ab (I2P-capable BitTorrent client required).
